long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Docio lets you organize notes in notebooks with chapters. While reading an article or blog, one can select text and to notebooks. Docio also provides an option to export notebooks to PDFs. All the data is stored locally ensuring privacy. Docio doesn't connect to any server and manages data locally, hence your data is only visible to you.
